bos.Qst: "Pjevanje ""Ovdje iza rijeke"" u Pocahontas"
bos.Rep:
**Pjevanje "Ovdje iza rijeke" u Pocahontas**

**Scena:** Pocahontas i John Smith stoje na obali rijeke.

**Pocahontas:**
Ovdje iza rijeke,
Gdje se nebo sastaje sa zemljom,
Živi narod moj,
U harmoniji s prirodom.

**John Smith:**
Tvoj glas je kao pjesma,
Šapće mi tajne ove zemlje.
Želim da saznam više,
O tvojem svijetu i tvojem narodu.

**Pocahontas:**
Dođi sa mnom,
Preko rijeke,
Gdje ćeš vidjeti ljepotu,
Koju nikada nisi zamislio.

**Zajedno:**
Ovdje iza rijeke,
Gdje se dva svijeta susreću,
Mi ćemo pronaći zajednički jezik,
I izgraditi most između naših naroda.

**Pocahontas:**
Vjetar će nas voditi,
Rijeka će nam pokazati put,
A ptice će pjevati našu pjesmu,
Ovdje iza rijeke.

**John Smith:**
Tvoja riječi su kao med,
Slatke i opojne,
Vodi me, Pocahontas,
U tvoj svijet,
Ovdje iza rijeke.
bos.Rep_En:
Singing "Here Beyond the River" in Pocahontas
Scene: Pocahontas and John Smith standing on the riverbank.
Pocahontas, what are you doing?
Here across the river,
Where heaven meets earth,
Long live my people,
In harmony with nature.
John Smith: What are you doing?
Your voice is like a song,
He'll whisper the secrets of this land to me.
I want to know more,
About your world and your people.
Pocahontas, what are you doing?
Come with me,
Across the river,
Where you'll see beauty,
Which you never imagined.
Together:
Here across the river,
Where two worlds meet,
We'll find a common language,
And build a bridge between our peoples.
Pocahontas, what are you doing?
The wind will lead us,
The river will show us the way,
And the birds will sing our song,
Here, across the river.
John Smith: What are you doing?
Your words are like honey,
Sweet and intoxicating,
Take me with you, Pocahontas,
In your world,
Here, across the river.

cmn.Qst: 在波卡洪塔斯的河<unk>边唱歌
cmn.Rep:
在波卡洪塔斯的河边歌唱
微风轻拂，水波荡漾
她的歌声如天籁，回荡在岸上
诉说着古老的传说，流传至今

她唱着祖先的智慧，大自然的恩赐
唱着爱与和平，唱着希望与梦想
她的歌声穿透时空，触动每个人的心弦
唤醒人们对自然的敬畏，对生命的热爱

在波卡洪塔斯的河边歌唱
她的歌声是桥梁，连接过去与未来
是纽带，将人们的心紧紧相连
是希望的火种，照亮前行的道路

她的歌声将永远回荡在河边
激励着人们，指引着方向
在波卡洪塔斯的河边歌唱
她的歌声，永不消逝
cmn.Rep_En:
Singing by the River in Pocahontas
The wind blows lightly, the water waves.
Her voice was like a thunderbolt, echoing on the shore.
It's an ancient legend that's still being passed down.
She sings of the wisdom of her ancestors, the bounty of nature.
Singing love and peace, singing hope and dreams
Her voice pierces time and space, touching everyone's heart.
It's about awakening people's reverence for nature and their love for life.
Singing by the River in Pocahontas
Her voice is a bridge between the past and the future.
It's a bond that connects people's hearts.
It is the fire of hope that illuminates the way forward.
Her voice will always echo by the river
It's about inspiring people and giving them direction.
Singing by the River in Pocahontas
Her voice will never die.

cmn_Hant.Qst: 唱歌的河流在波卡洪塔斯 (Pocahontas)
cmn_Hant.Rep:
**歌曲：** 唱歌的河流

**电影：** 波卡洪塔斯

**歌词：**

(诗句 1)
在森林深处，河流在歌唱
它讲述着古老的故事，它讲述着古老的故事
关于一个女孩和一个男人，他们的爱超越了界限
在唱歌的河流中，他们的命运交织在一起

(合唱)
唱歌的河流，流淌着故事
关于爱、希望和荣耀
它唱着他们的旅程，唱着他们的梦想
在唱歌的河流中，他们的灵魂自由翱翔

(诗句 2)
河流见证了他们的相遇
当他们的目光在水面上相遇时
它见证了他们的友谊，见证了他们的纽带
在唱歌的河流中，他们的心紧紧相连

(合唱)
唱歌的河流，流淌着故事
关于爱、希望和荣耀
它唱着他们的旅程，唱着他们的梦想
在唱歌的河流中，他们的灵魂自由翱翔

(桥段)
但他们的爱面临着考验
来自不同世界的偏见和恐惧
但河流继续歌唱，为他们指引道路
在唱歌的河流中，他们找到了力量和希望

(诗句 3)
当他们面对危险时，河流保护他们
它冲走他们的敌人，让他们安全
它见证了他们的胜利，见证了他们的和平
在唱歌的河流中，他们的故事永远流传

(合唱)
唱歌的河流，流淌着故事
关于爱、希望和荣耀
它唱着他们的旅程，唱着他们的梦想
在唱歌的河流中，他们的灵魂自由翱翔

(尾声)
唱歌的河流，永远歌唱
关于波卡洪塔斯和约翰·史密斯的爱情故事
它提醒我们，即使在最黑暗的时刻
爱和希望的力量也能照亮道路
cmn_Hant.Rep_En:
Songs: The singing river
Film by Pocahontas
The lyrics:
(Verse 1) What is the Bible's view?
Deep in the forest, the rivers sing
It tells an old story, it tells an old story.
About a girl and a man whose love crosses boundaries
Their destinies intertwined in the singing rivers
(Singing) What is it?
Singing rivers, flowing stories
About love, hope and glory
It sings their journey, it sings their dreams.
In the singing rivers, their souls fly free
(Verse 2) What is the Bible's view?
The river witnessed their encounter
When their eyes meet on the water
It is a testimony to their friendship, a testimony to their bond.
In the singing rivers, their hearts are joined
(Singing) What is it?
Singing rivers, flowing stories
About love, hope and glory
It sings their journey, it sings their dreams.
In the singing rivers, their souls fly free
(Bridge section)
But their love is being tested
Prejudice and Fear From Different Worlds
But the river continues to sing and show them the way.
In the singing river, they found strength and hope
(Verse 3) What is the Bible's view?
Rivers protect them when they face danger
It drives away their enemies and keeps them safe.
It witnessed their victory, it witnessed their peace.
In the singing rivers, their stories will live on forever
(Singing) What is it?
Singing rivers, flowing stories
About love, hope and glory
It sings their journey, it sings their dreams.
In the singing rivers, their souls fly free
(Laughter)
Singing rivers, singing forever
The love story of Pocahontas and John Smith
It reminds us that even in the darkest of times
The power of love and hope can also light the way

hun.Qst: aki a Pocahontas folyó kanyarán énekel.
hun.Rep:
A Pocahontas folyó kanyargó partján,
Éneke száll, mint a szellő, lágyan.
Hangja cseng, mint a madarak dala,
Édes dallam, mely a szívet meghatja.

A víz csobog, a fák susognak,
Természet zenéje kíséri dalát.
Szavai mesélnek ősi legendákról,
A föld és az ég örök kapcsolatáról.

Éneke a múlt és a jelen hídja,
Összeköti a népeket, a kultúrákat.
Hangja a remény és a béke üzenete,
Egy jobb világ vízióját festi elénk.

A Pocahontas folyó kanyarán énekel,
Hangja a szabadság és a szeretet szimbóluma.
Éneke örökre szólni fog,
Emlékeztetve minket a természet szépségére és az emberi szellem erejére.
hun.Rep_En:
On the meandering banks of the Pocahontas River,
His soul flies like the wind, gentle.
His voice rings like a bird's song,
My sweet song, which can touch the heart.
The water is dripping, the trees are rustling,
The music of nature accompanies the song.
They speak of ancient legends,
The eternal connection between earth and sky.
I'm the bridge between the past and the present,
It unites peoples, cultures.
The voice of hope and the message of peace,
He presents us with a vision of a better world.
The Pocahontas River sings at the bend,
His voice is a symbol of freedom and love.
His song will be forever,
Reminding us of the beauty of nature and the power of the human spirit.

Dengan harapan dan kedamaian

jav.Rep_En:
Temple 1
On the banks of a calm river
Where the water flows
I stand, my heart sings
Countless melodies
The Chorus
Sing, sing by the river
In Pocahontas, the beautiful land
The sound of nature, the sweet harmony
Fill the air with joy
Temple 2
Birds chirping above
Swaying trees follow the rhythm
The wind whispers, carries the song
From a lush forest
The Chorus
Sing, sing by the river
In Pocahontas, the beautiful land
The sound of nature, the sweet harmony
Fill the air with joy
The Bridge

Temple 3

Until the dawn is breaking
And the sun rises in the morning

In Pocahontas, the beautiful land
The sound of nature, the sweet harmony
Fill the air with joy
Others
My song will echo
Through forests and valleys
Remind everyone of this
The beauty of Pocahontas

jpn.Rep:
How to get the value of a specific key from a JSON object in Java?

I have a JSON object in Java and I want to get the value of a specific key from it. For example, if I have the following JSON object: { "name": "John Doe", "age": 30, "city": "New York" } And I want to get the value of the "name" key, I would do the following: String name = jsonObject.getString("name"); This would return the value "John Doe". How can I do this for a key that is not known in advance? For example, if I have the following JSON object: { "key1": "value1", "key2": "value2", "key3": "value3" } And I want to get the value of the key "key2", I would do the following: String value = jsonObject.getString("key2"); This would return the value "value2". However, if I don't know the key in advance, how can I get the value? [Answer 1] You can use the keySet() method to get a set of all the keys in the JSON object, and then iterate over the set to find the key you're looking for. For example, the following code would get the value of the "key2" key from the JSON object: Set keys = jsonObject.keySet(); for (String key : keys) { if (key.equals("key2")) { String value = jsonObject.getString(key); // Do something with the value } } You can also use the containsKey() method to check if a key exists in the JSON object before trying to get its value. For example, the following code would check if the "key2" key exists in the JSON object, and if it does, it would get its value: if (jsonObject.containsKey("key2")) { String value = jsonObject.getString("key2"); // Do something with the value } [Answer 2] You can use the keySet() method to get a set of all the keys in the JSON object, and then iterate over the set to find the key you're looking for. For example, the following code would get the value of the "key2" key from the JSON object: Set keys = jsonObject.keySet(); for (String key : keys) { if (key.equals("key2")) { String value = jsonObject.getString(key); // Do something with the value } } You can also use the containsKey() method to check if a key exists in the JSON object before trying to get its value. For example, the following code would check if the "key2" key exists in the JSON object, and if it does, it would get its value: if (jsonObject.containsKey("key2")) { String value = jsonObject.getString("key2"); // Do something with the value }

kor.Qst: Pocahontas의 강변을 따라 노래하는
kor.Rep:
포카혼타스의 강변을 따라 노래하며
바람이 내 머리카락을 흩날리게 하네요.
물결이 부드럽게 흔들리며
내 노래에 맞춰 춤추는 것 같아요.

강둑의 나무들이 내 노래에 귀 기울이며
새들이 나와 함께 합창을 부르네요.
자연의 교향곡이 내 영혼을 채우고
내 마음을 평화와 기쁨으로 가득 채워요.

포카혼타스의 강변은 마법의 장소
내 영혼이 자유롭게 날아오르는 곳이에요.
노래하며 춤추며 나는 하나가 되고
세상의 모든 걱정을 잊어버려요.

강물이 흐르는 소리, 새들의 지저귐
이 모든 것이 내 노래를 더욱 아름답게 만들어요.
포카혼타스의 강변을 따라 노래하며
나는 내 진정한 자아를 찾아요.
kor.Rep_En:
They sing along the banks of the Pocahontas.
The wind is blowing my hair.
The waves sway gently.
I think I'm dancing to my song.
The trees of the valley listen to my song.
The birds sing along with me.
The symphony of nature fills my soul.
Fill my heart with peace and joy.
The river banks of Pocahontas are a magical place.
It's a place where my soul can fly freely.
Singing and dancing, I am one.
Forget all the worries of the world.
The sound of the river flowing, the chirping of the birds
All of this makes my song even more beautiful.
They sing along the banks of the Pocahontas.
I'm looking for my true self.

swh.Qst: Wimbo wa Mto Pocahontas
swh.Rep:
**Mstari wa 1**
Kando ya mto, ambapo maji yanapita,
Kuna hadithi ya msichana, moyo wake ni mwepesi.
Pocahontas, binti wa mkuu,
Roho ya bure, mwitu na huru.

**Kwaya**
Mto, mto, unapita kwa kasi,
Ukichukua siri za zamani.
Pocahontas, Pocahontas, jina lake linasikika,
Hadithi ya upendo, ujasiri na kiburi.

**Mstari wa 2**
Alimpenda mgeni kutoka nchi ya mbali,
John Smith, nahodha jasiri na mwenye nguvu.
Pamoja walivuka mipaka,
Kuleta amani kati ya watu wao.

**Kwaya**
Mto, mto, unapita kwa kasi,
Ukichukua siri za zamani.
Pocahontas, Pocahontas, jina lake linasikika,
Hadithi ya upendo, ujasiri na kiburi.

**Daraja**
Lakini hatima ilikuwa na mipango mingine,
Na Pocahontas alilazimika kuondoka nyumbani kwake.
Alivuka bahari hadi nchi ya mbali,
Ambapo alikufa mbali na wapendwa wake.

**Mstari wa 3**
Hata hivyo, kumbukumbu yake inaendelea kuishi,
Katika hadithi na nyimbo, katika mioyo yetu.
Pocahontas, ishara ya amani na upendo,
Hadithi yake itaendelea kuambiwa milele.

**Kwaya**
Mto, mto, unapita kwa kasi,
Ukichukua siri za zamani.
Pocahontas, Pocahontas, jina lake linasikika,
Hadithi ya upendo, ujasiri na kiburi.

**Outro**
Kando ya mto, ambapo maji yanapita,
Hadithi ya Pocahontas itaendelea kuishi.
Msichana wa asili, roho ya bure,
Kumbukumbu yake itaendelea kuangaza milele.
swh.Rep_En:
Line 1
By the river, where the water flows,
There is a story of a girl, her heart is light.
Pocahontas, the daughter of the chief,
A free, wild and free spirit.
The Choir
The river, the river, it flows fast,
You take the secrets of the past.
Pocahontas, Pocahontas, her name is heard,
A story of love, courage and pride.
Line 2
He loved a stranger from a distant land,
John Smith, a brave and powerful captain.
Together they crossed borders,
Bring peace among their people.
The Choir
The river, the river, it flows fast,
You take the secrets of the past.
Pocahontas, Pocahontas, her name is heard,
A story of love, courage and pride.
The Bridge
But fate had other plans,
Pocahontas was forced to leave her home.
He crossed the sea to a distant land,
Where he died away from his loved ones.
Line 3
However, his memory lives on,
In stories and songs, in our hearts.
Pocahontas, a symbol of peace and love,
His story will be told forever.
The Choir
The river, the river, it flows fast,
You take the secrets of the past.
Pocahontas, Pocahontas, her name is heard,
A story of love, courage and pride.
Other
By the river, where the water flows,
The story of Pocahontas will live on.
The natural girl, the free soul,
His memory will continue to shine forever.

yue.Qst: 喺波卡洪塔斯河邊唱歌
yue.Rep:
在波卡洪塔斯河畔，我放聲歌唱，
清澈的流水，伴我悠揚。
河岸的柳樹，隨風輕擺，
宛如少女的長髮，柔情似水。

河面波光粼粼，似碎金閃爍，
映照著藍天白雲，美不勝收。
鳥兒在枝頭歡唱，婉轉動聽，
與我的歌聲交織，譜成一曲天籟。

河水潺潺流淌，訴說著古老的故事，
波卡洪塔斯公主，與約翰史密斯相戀。
他們的愛情，跨越了種族與文化，
成為一段傳奇，流傳至今。

我唱著唱著，仿佛置身於那個時代，
見證了他們的愛情，他們的堅貞。
波卡洪塔斯河畔，承載著歷史的記憶，
也承載著我對愛情的嚮往。

在波卡洪塔斯河畔，我唱著唱著，
直到夕陽西下，餘暉灑滿河面。
河水泛著金光，波光粼粼，
我的歌聲也漸漸消逝在晚風中。
yue.Rep_En:
On the banks of the Pocahontas River, I was singing and dancing.
Clear water, accompanied by my longing.
The willows on the banks of the river, with the wind blowing lightly,
Like a girl's long hair, soft like water.
The waves of the river, like golden flashes,
It's a picture of the blue sky and the white clouds, and it's beautiful.
The birds sing in the branches, and the birds listen.
And my song is woven, and the music is a melody.
Rivers flow, stories told in the past,
Princess Pokhontas, with whom John Smith is in love.
Their love transcends race and culture.
It became a legend, and it's still going strong.
I sing, as if I'm in that era,
It shows their love, their integrity
The Port of Hong Kong, with its historical memory,
It also carries my love for you.
On the banks of the Pocahontas River, I was singing,
Until the sunset, the rest of the sun shines on the river.
The river flooded with gold and light, and the waves flooded with light.
My song is fading away in the late wind.

lao.Qst: ການປົກຄອງຂອງມົງໂກລ ໃນຈີນ
lao.Rep:
**การปกครองของมองโกลในจีน**

การปกครองของมองโกลในจีนเริ่มต้นขึ้นในปี 1271 เมื่อกุบไลข่านพิชิตราชวงศ์ซ่งใต้และสถาปนาราชวงศ์หยวน ราชวงศ์หยวนปกครองจีนเป็นเวลาเกือบ 100 ปี จนกระทั่งล่มสลายในปี 1368

**การปกครอง**

* **จักรพรรดิ:** กุบไลข่านและผู้สืบทอดตำแหน่งเป็นจักรพรรดิแห่งราชวงศ์หยวน พวกเขามีอำนาจสูงสุดในอาณาจักร
* **ขุนนาง:** ขุนนางมองโกลปกครองจีนร่วมกับขุนนางชาวจีนที่ภักดีต่อราชวงศ์หยวน
* **ระบบการปกครองแบบแบ่งเขต:** จีนแบ่งออกเป็น 10 จังหวัด ซึ่งแต่ละจังหวัดมีผู้ว่าราชการจังหวัดที่ได้รับการแต่งตั้งจากจักรพรรดิ
* **ระบบภาษี:** ราชวงศ์หยวนจัดเก็บภาษีจากประชาชนชาวจีน ซึ่งรวมถึงภาษีที่ดิน ภาษีทรัพย์สิน และภาษีการค้า

**นโยบาย**

* **การรวมศูนย์อำนาจ:** กุบไลข่านรวมศูนย์อำนาจไว้ที่รัฐบาลกลาง โดยลดอำนาจของขุนนางท้องถิ่น
* **การส่งเสริมการค้า:** ราชวงศ์หยวนส่งเสริมการค้าทั้งภายในและภายนอกประเทศ โดยสร้างถนนและคลองใหม่ๆ
* **การแลกเปลี่ยนทางวัฒนธรรม:** ราชวงศ์หยวนอุปถัมภ์ศิลปะและวัฒนธรรมจีน และยังส่งเสริมการแลกเปลี่ยนทางวัฒนธรรมกับประเทศอื่นๆ
* **การกดขี่ชาวจีน:** ชาวมองโกลปกครองชาวจีนด้วยความรุนแรงและการกดขี่ ชาวจีนถูกห้ามไม่ให้มีอาวุธและถูกบังคับให้สวมเสื้อผ้าที่แตกต่างจากชาวมองโกล

**ผลกระทบ**

การปกครองของมองโกลในจีนมีผลกระทบทั้งในแง่บวกและแง่ลบ

**ผลกระทบในแง่บวก:**

* การรวมศูนย์อำนาจและการส่งเสริมการค้าช่วยให้จีนมีความเจริญรุ่งเรืองทางเศรษฐกิจ
* การแลกเปลี่ยนทางวัฒนธรรมนำไปสู่การพัฒนาทางศิลปะและวัฒนธรรมใหม่ๆ

**ผลกระทบในแง่ลบ:**

* การกดขี่ชาวจีนนำไปสู่ความขุ่นเคืองและการจลาจล
* การแบ่งแยกทางสังคมระหว่างชาวมองโกลและชาวจีนสร้างความตึงเครียดและความขัดแย้ง
* การปกครองของมองโกลทำให้เกิดความเสียหายต่อประชากรและเศรษฐกิจของจีน
lao.Rep_En:
The reign of Mongolism in China
The reign of the Mongols in China began in 1271 when the Qing Dynasty conquered the southern Song Dynasty and the Yuan Dynasty ruled China for almost 100 years until its collapse in 1368.
Governance
Emperor: The Gublai Khan and his successors as emperors of the Yuan dynasty had the highest power in the empire
Empress: Empress Mongolian ruled China along with the Chinese empress who was loyal to the Yuan dynasty
A divisional system of government: China is divided into 10 provinces, each with a provincial governor appointed by the emperor
Tax system: The Yuan dynasty collected taxes from the Chinese people, including land taxes, property taxes, and trade taxes
Policy
Integration of power: Gublai Khan consolidates power in the central government by reducing the power of local princes
Promotion of trade: The Yuan dynasty promoted trade both domestically and abroad by building new roads and canals
Cultural exchanges: The Yuan Dynasty preserved Chinese art and culture and also promoted cultural exchanges with other countries
Chinese repression: Chinese oppressors rule the Chinese with violence and oppression Chinese are forbidden to carry weapons and are forced to wear clothing different from Chinese oppressors
Effects
China's monopoly on the world's markets affects both positively and negatively
The result is positive:
The consolidation of power and the promotion of trade have helped China prosper economically.
Cultural exchange leads to new artistic and cultural developments
The effect on the liver:
Chinese oppression leads to chaos and chaos
Social divisions between Mongolians and Chinese create tension and conflict
The Chinese government's dominance has hurt China's population and economy

mkd.Qst: Како владееле монголците во Кина?
mkd.Rep:
Монголците владееле во Кина од 1271. до 1368. године, током династије Јуан.

**Успон Монголског царства**

* Монголско царство је основао Џингис Кан 1206. године.
* Под вођством Џингис Кана и његових наследника, Монголи су освојили огромне територије, укључујући Кину.

**Инвазија на Кину**

* Монголи су први пут напали Кину 1211. године.
* Након више деценија ратовања, Монголи су коначно освојили династију Сонг 1279. године.

**Династија Јуан**

* Монголски цар Кублај Кан је основао династију Јуан 1271. године.
* Династија Јуан је владала Кином као страно царство.
* Монголи су успоставили нову престоницу у Пекингу (тада познатом као Даду).

**Управа династије Јуан**

* Монголи су поделили кинеско становништво у четири класе: Монголи, Семури (страни сарадници), Хан (Кинези) и Ју (јужни Кинези).
* Монголи су успоставили строг систем закона и реда.
* Промовисали су трговину и размену са другим деловима света.

**Пад династије Јуан**

* Династија Јуан је почела да слаби у 14. веку.
* Кинески побуњеници су се побунили против монголске владавине.
* 1368. године, побуњенички вођа Џу Јуенџанг је основао династију Минг и протерао Монголе из Кине.
mkd.Rep_En:
The Mongols ruled China from 1271 to 1368, during the Yuan Dynasty.
The Rise of the Mongol Empire
The Mongol Empire was founded by Genghis Khan in 1206.
Under the leadership of Genghis Khan and his successors, the Mongols conquered vast territories, including China.
The invasion of China
The Mongols first attacked China in 1211.
After decades of warfare, the Mongols finally conquered the Song Dynasty in 1279.
Yuan dynasty
The Mongol emperor Kublai Khan founded the Yuan dynasty in 1271.
The Yuan Dynasty ruled China as a foreign empire.
The Mongols established a new capital in Beijing (then known as Dadu).
Yuan dynasty rule
The Mongols divided the Chinese population into four classes: Mongols, Semuri (foreign collaborators), Han (Kinese) and Yu (southern Chinese).
The Mongols established a strict system of law and order.
They promoted trade and exchange with other parts of the world.
The Fall of the Yuan Dynasty
The Yuan dynasty began to weaken in the 14th century.
Chinese rebels rebelled against Mongol rule.
In 1368, rebel leader Zhu Yuanzhang founded the Ming Dynasty and expelled the Mongols from China.

cmn_Hant.Qst: 唱歌的10个我讨厌你的事情
cmn_Hant.Rep:
1. **跑调：**当音符偏离音高时，会让人抓狂。
2. **走音：**当歌手唱错音符时，会破坏歌曲的和谐。
3. **缺乏情感：**如果歌手没有投入情感，歌曲就会显得平淡无奇。
4. **过度修音：**过度使用自动调音会让声音失真，失去真实感。
5. **过分炫技：**当歌手过度炫耀自己的技巧时，会分散对歌曲本身的注意力。
6. **缺乏原创性：**翻唱歌曲时，如果歌手没有加入自己的风格，就会显得乏味。
7. **歌词含糊不清：**当歌手的咬字不清时，会让人难以理解歌词。
8. **节奏不稳：**当歌手的节奏不稳时，会破坏歌曲的流动性。
9. **缺乏舞台魅力：**如果歌手在舞台上缺乏魅力，会让观众失去兴趣。
10. **自以为是：**当歌手表现得自以为是时，会让人反感。
cmn_Hant.Rep_En:
1. Running tone: When the note is off the high note, it makes you go crazy.
2. Walking: When a singer sings the wrong note, it disrupts the harmony of the song
3. Lack of emotion: If the singer doesn't put his emotions into the song, it will seem dull and unremarkable.
4. Excessive tuning: Excessive use of auto-tune can distort the sound and lose its authenticity.
5. Excessive showmanship: When a singer exaggerates his skills, it distracts attention from the song itself.
6. Lack of originality: When singing a song, the singer may seem dull if he or she does not add his or her own style.
7. Ambiguous lyrics: When the singer's words are unclear, it can be difficult to understand the lyrics.
8. Unstable rhythm: When the singer's rhythm is unstable, it disrupts the flow of the song.
9. Lack of stage charm: If a singer lacks stage charm, it can make the audience lose interest.
10. Self-righteousness: When a singer acts self-righteous, it can be repulsive.

heb.Qst: שרה ב"עשר דברים שאני שונא בך".
heb.Rep:
* **עקשנית:** שרה היא דמות עקשנית מאוד, לעתים קרובות מסרבת להתפשר או לשנות את דעתה.
* **אינטליגנטית:** היא תלמידה מצטיינת ובעלת ידע רב.
* **צינית:** שרה לעתים קרובות צינית וביקורתית כלפי אחרים.
* **עצמאית:** היא עצמאית מאוד ואינה זקוקה לאיש שידאג לה.
* **מורדת:** שרה היא מורדת ואינה מפחדת לעמוד על שלה.
* **רגישה:** למרות חזותה הקשוחה, שרה היא למעשה אדם רגיש ופגיע.
* **פמיניסטית:** היא פמיניסטית חזקה ומאמינה בשוויון בין המינים.
* **אומנותית:** שרה היא גם אומנית מוכשרת ונהנית לצייר ולנגן בגיטרה.
* **סרקסטית:** היא לעתים קרובות סרקסטית ואינה מפחדת לומר את דעתה.
* **אכפתית:** למרות חזותה הקשוחה, שרה אכפתית מאוד מחבריה ומשפחתה.
heb.Rep_En:
Stubborn: Sarah is a very stubborn character, often refusing to compromise or change her mind.
Intelligent: She's an excellent student with a lot of knowledge.
Cynical: Sarah is often cynical and critical of others.
Independent: She's very independent and doesn't need anyone to take care of her.

jav.Qst: sing main hakim ing panggonan apik
jav.Rep:
**Panggonan Apik kanggo Nyanyi Hakim**

**1. Ruang Konser**

* Aula konser dirancang khusus kanggo akustik sing apik, ngasilake swara sing jernih lan seimbang.
* Panggung sing gedhe lan pencahayaan profesional ngoptimalake pengalaman pertunjukan.
* Kursi sing nyaman lan tata letak sing apik ngasilake lingkungan sing nyaman kanggo penonton.

**2. Teater**

* Teater nawakake akustik sing apik lan panggung sing dirancang kanggo pertunjukan langsung.
* Kursi sing ditata ing bentuk tapal kuda ngasilake pengalaman sing intim kanggo penonton.
* Pencahayaan lan tata suara sing canggih ngoptimalake pertunjukan.

**3. Aula Universitas**

* Aula universitas sering kali dilengkapi akustik sing apik lan panggung sing cukup gedhe kanggo pertunjukan.
* Kursi sing nyaman lan tata letak sing fleksibel ngakomodasi berbagai ukuran penonton.
* Aksesibilitas sing apik lan fasilitas pendukung nggawe pengalaman sing nyaman.

**4. Gereja**

* Gereja historis sering kali memiliki akustik yang luar biasa karena langit-langit yang tinggi dan permukaan yang keras.
* Panggung yang ditinggikan dan pencahayaan alami menciptakan suasana yang khusyuk.
* Kursi yang nyaman dan tata letak yang intim memberikan pengalaman yang mendalam.

**5. Taman Botani**

* Taman botani menawarkan lingkungan luar ruangan yang indah dengan akustik alami yang baik.
* Panggung yang dikelilingi oleh pepohonan dan tanaman menciptakan suasana yang tenang dan damai.
* Penonton dapat menikmati pertunjukan sambil dikelilingi oleh keindahan alam.

**6. Museum**

* Museum dengan atrium atau ruang pameran yang luas dapat menjadi tempat yang unik untuk pertunjukan vokal.
* Arsitektur yang menarik dan karya seni yang dipamerkan menciptakan latar belakang yang menginspirasi.
* Pencahayaan dan tata suara yang disesuaikan memastikan pengalaman mendengarkan yang optimal.

**7. Galeri Seni**

* Galeri seni dengan ruang terbuka dan langit-langit yang tinggi dapat memberikan akustik yang baik.
* Karya seni yang dipamerkan dapat menginspirasi dan melengkapi pertunjukan.
* Pencahayaan yang dramatis dan tata letak yang fleksibel memungkinkan pertunjukan yang imersif.
jav.Rep_En:
A Good Place to Sing Judge
1. The Concert Hall
The concert hall is specially designed for good acoustics, producing a clear and balanced sound.
The large stage and professional lighting optimize the performance experience.
Comfortable seats and a nice layout produce a comfortable environment for the audience.
2. Theatre
The theater offers great acoustics and a stage designed for live performances.
Seats arranged in the shape of a horse's hoof produce an intimate experience for the audience.
State-of-the-art lighting and sound optimize the show.
3. Halls of the University
University halls are often equipped with excellent acoustics and a fairly large stage for performances.
Comfortable seats and flexible layout accommodate a variety of audience sizes.
Good accessibility and supporting facilities make for a comfortable experience.
4. The Church
Historic churches often have extraordinary acoustics due to high ceilings and hard surfaces.
The elevated stage and natural lighting create a cosy atmosphere.
Comfortable seats and intimate layout provide a deep experience.
5. The Botanical Gardens
The botanical garden offers a beautiful outdoor environment with good natural acoustics.
The stage surrounded by trees and plants creates a calm and peaceful atmosphere.
Viewers can enjoy the show while surrounded by the beauty of nature.
The Museum 6.
A museum with an atrium or large exhibition space can be a unique place for vocal performances.
The fascinating architecture and artwork on display create an inspiring backdrop.
Adjusted lighting and sound ensure an optimal listening experience.
7. Art gallery
Art galleries with open spaces and high ceilings can provide good acoustics.
The artwork exhibited can inspire and complement the show.
Dramatic lighting and flexible layout allow for immersive performances.

jpn.Rep:
**法廷ドラマの撮影場所**

* **ロサンゼルス郡裁判所** (ロサンゼルス、カリフォルニア州): 「法と秩序: ロサンゼルス」、「ボストン・リーガル」、「アリー my Love」
* **ニューヨーク州最高裁判所** (ニューヨーク市、ニューヨーク州): 「法と秩序」、「法と秩序: 特別捜査班」、「グッド・ワイフ」
* **シカゴ市庁舎** (シカゴ、イリノイ州): 「シカゴ・ファイア」、「シカゴ P.D.」、「シカゴ・メッド」
* **バンクーバー法廷** (バンクーバー、ブリティッシュコロンビア州): 「スーツ」、「フォーティチュード」、「アルタード・カーボン」
* **トロント市庁舎** (トロント、オンタリオ州): 「リーガル・マインド」、「スーツ」、「フォーティチュード」

**法廷を模したスタジオ**

* **ユニバーサル・スタジオ・ハリウッド** (ロサンゼルス、カリフォルニア州): 「法と秩序: ロサンゼルス」、「ボストン・リーガル」
* **ワーナー・ブラザーズ・スタジオ** (バーバンク、カリフォルニア州): 「アリー my Love」、「シカゴ・ファイア」
* **パラマウント・ピクチャーズ・スタジオ** (ハリウッド、カリフォルニア州): 「法と秩序: 特別捜査班」、「グッド・ワイフ」
* **ライオンズゲート・スタジオ** (バンクーバー、ブリティッシュコロンビア州): 「スーツ」、「フォーティチュード」
* **パインウッド・トロント・スタジオ** (トロント、オンタリオ州): 「リーガル・マインド」、「スーツ」

**その他の場所**

* **歴史的建造物:** 古い裁判所や市庁舎は、法廷ドラマの撮影にしばしば使用されます。
* **大学キャンパス:** 大学の講堂や図書館は、法廷のシーンに適しています。
* **会議場:** 広々とした会議場は、大規模な法廷シーンの撮影に使用できます。
* **プライベートスタジオ:** 一部の制作会社は、法廷シーンを撮影するためのプライベートスタジオを所有しています。
* **バーチャルセット:** 最新の技術により、制作会社は現実的な法廷セットをバーチャルに作成できます。

kor.Qst: 좋은 장소에서 판사를 연기하는
kor.Rep:
**장면:** 법정

**등장인물:**

* 판사
* 변호사
* 피고인
* 배심원

**판사:** (망치를 두드리며) 법정을 개정합니다.

**변호사:** 존경하는 판사님, 피고인은 무죄를 주장합니다.

**판사:** 증거를 제시하세요.

**변호사:** (증거를 제시함) 이 증거는 피고인이 범죄 당시 현장에 없었음을 분명히 보여줍니다.

**검사:** (반대 심문함) 그러나 증인의 진술은 신뢰할 수 없습니다.

**판사:** (배심원에게) 배심원 여러분, 증거를 신중히 검토하시기 바랍니다.

**변호사:** (최종 변론함) 존경하는 배심원 여러분, 피고인은 무죄입니다. 증거는 그가 범죄를 저지르지 않았음을 분명히 보여줍니다.

**검사:** (최종 변론함) 배심원 여러분, 피고인은 유죄입니다. 증거는 그가 범죄를 저질렀음을 압도적으로 보여줍니다.

**판사:** (배심원에게) 배심원 여러분, 이제 숙의실로 들어가서 평결을 내리시기 바랍니다.

**배심원:** (숙의실로 나감)

**판사:** (잠시 후) 배심원이 평결을 내렸습니다. 배심원장, 평결을 발표해 주시겠습니까?

**배심원장:** 존경하는 판사님, 배심원은 피고인을 무죄로 판결했습니다.

**판사:** (망치를 두드리며) 피고인은 무죄입니다. 법정은 해산됩니다.

The scene: court.

The judge.
The lawyer.
The defendant.

The judge: (blinking) I'm going to change the law.
The defendant, the honorable judge, pleads not guilty.
Judge: Please present evidence.
The evidence clearly shows that the defendant was not present at the time of the crime.
"But the testimony of the witnesses cannot be trusted.
Judge: (to the jury) Ladies and gentlemen of the jury, please review the evidence carefully.
"Dear jurors, the defendant is innocent, the evidence clearly shows that he did not commit the crime.
The jury, ladies and gentlemen, the defendant is guilty, and the evidence overwhelmingly shows that he committed the crime.
The Judge: (to the jury) Gentlemen of the jury, please enter the courtroom now and make your verdict.
The jury:
The judge: (after a moment) The jury has reached a verdict. The jury chairman, would you like to announce the verdict?
The jury, with the exception of the judge, acquitted the defendant.
The judge: (thumping) The defendant is innocent. The court is dissolved.

lit.Qst: kuris žaidžia teisėjo gerą vietą
lit.Rep:
**Teisėjo geros vietos**

**Teniso aikštelė**

* **Kėdės teisėjas:** Sėdi ant aukštos kėdės tinklo viduryje ir šaukia taškus, padavimus ir klaidas.
* **Linijos teisėjai:** Stovi aikštelės kampuose ir šaukia, kai kamuoliukas išeina iš aikštelės.
* **Serviso teisėjas:** Stovi už bazinės linijos ir šaukia, ar padavimas yra geras ar blogas.

**Krepšinio aikštelė**

* **Pagrindinis teisėjas:** Stovi aikštelės viduryje ir šaukia pražangas, taškus ir kitus žaidimo įvykius.
* **Šoniniai teisėjai:** Stovi aikštelės šonuose ir šaukia, kai kamuolys išeina iš aikštelės arba kai žaidėjas daro pražangą.
* **Stalo teisėjas:** Sėdi prie stalo ir tvarko laikmatį, taškus ir pražangas.

**Futbolo aikštelė**

* **Pagrindinis teisėjas:** Stovi aikštelės viduryje ir šaukia pražangas, įvarčius ir kitus žaidimo įvykius.
* **Asistentai teisėjai:** Stovi aikštelės šonuose ir šaukia, kai kamuolys išeina iš aikštelės arba kai žaidėjas daro pražangą.
* **Ketvirtasis teisėjas:** Stovi už atsarginių suolo ir tvarko keitimus ir kitus administracinius klausimus.

**Beisbolo aikštelė**

* **Pagrindinis teisėjas:** Stovi už namų lėkštės ir šaukia kamuolius, smūgius ir autus.
* **Bazės teisėjai:** Stovi prie kiekvienos bazės ir šaukia, kai bėgikas yra saugus arba autas.
* **Lauko teisėjas:** Stovi už antrosios bazės ir šaukia, kai kamuolys yra geras arba blogas.

**Ledo ritulio aikštelė**

* **Pagrindinis teisėjas:** Stovi aikštelės viduryje ir šaukia pražangas, įvarčius ir kitus žaidimo įvykius.
* **Linijos teisėjai:** Stovi aikštelės šonuose ir šaukia, kai kamuolys išeina iš aikštelės arba kai žaidėjas daro pražangą.
* **Tikslo teisėjas:** Stovi prie vartų ir šaukia, ar įvartis yra geras ar ne.
lit.Rep_En:
It was a good place.
Tennis court
Judge of the chair: Sits on a high chair in the middle of the net and shouts points, omissions and mistakes.
Line referees: Stand in the corners of the field and shout when the ball leaves the field.
The serving referee: Stands behind the baseline and shouts whether the serve is good or bad.
Basketball court
The main referee: Stands in the middle of the field and shouts tricks, points and other events of the game.
The referee stands on the sidelines of the pitch and shouts when the ball leaves the pitch or when a player makes a pass.
Judge of the table: Sits at the table and arranges the timing, dots and lines.
Football field
The main referee: Stands in the middle of the field and shouts the whistle, the shots and other events of the game.
Assistant referees: Stands on the sides of the field and shouts when the ball leaves the field or when a player makes a pass.
The fourth judge: Stands behind the reserve bench and handles changes and other administrative matters.
Baseball field
The main referee: Stands behind the home plate and shouts balls, punches and kicks.
Base judges: Stands at each base and shouts when the runner is safe or out.
The field referee: Stands behind the second base and shouts when the ball is good or bad.
Ice rink and rink
The main referee: Stands in the middle of the field and shouts the whistle, the shots and other events of the game.
Line referees: Stands on the sides of the field and shouts when the ball leaves the field or when a player makes a pass.
The goalkeeper: He stands at the goal and shouts whether the goal is good or not.

vie.Qst: người chơi thẩm phán trên nơi tốt
vie.Rep:
**Michael**

Michael là một người chơi thẩm phán trên The Good Place. Anh ấy là một thiên thần cấp cao, người đã tạo ra The Good Place và The Bad Place. Anh ấy cũng là người tạo ra Eleanor Shellstrop, một người phụ nữ đã vào nhầm The Good Place. Michael là một nhân vật phức tạp, người đã phải vật lộn với những cảm xúc của mình đối với Eleanor và những người bạn của cô ấy. Anh ấy cũng phải vật lộn với sự thật rằng anh ấy đã tạo ra The Bad Place, một nơi tra tấn. Tuy nhiên, Michael cuối cùng đã học được cách yêu thương và chấp nhận Eleanor và những người bạn của cô ấy. Anh ấy cũng học được rằng The Good Place không phải là một nơi hoàn hảo, nhưng đó là một nơi tốt.
vie.Rep_En:
Michael, what are you doing?
Michael is a high-ranking angel who created The Good Place and The Bad Place, and he also created Eleanor Shelton, a woman who was mistakenly cast in The Good Place.Michael is a complex character who struggles with his feelings for Eleanor and her friends, and struggles with the fact that he created The Bad Place, a place of torture.

yue.Qst: 扮演一個好地方嘅法官
yue.Rep:
**法官：**

歡迎來到好地方法庭。我是法官，我的職責是確保正義得到伸張，並維護這個社區的和諧。

我理解你們今天來到這裡，是因為你們之間存在分歧。請放心，我將公正地審理此案，並根據證據和法律做出裁決。

在我們開始之前，我想提醒你們，我們都是好地方的居民，我們有責任互相尊重和體諒。請保持禮貌和尊重的態度，並專注於手頭的問題。

現在，請原告陳述你的案件。
yue.Rep_En:
Judge: What is it?
Welcome to the good local court. I am a judge, my job is to ensure that justice is done, and to maintain the harmony of this community.

jav.Qst: sing nulis sampeyan bendera grand ol
jav.Rep:
**Bendera Grand Ol**

Oh, Bendera Grand Ol, berkibar dengan bangga,
Di atas tanah yang kita cintai, dari laut ke laut yang bersinar.
Simbol kebebasan, harapan, dan mimpi,
Bendera yang menginspirasi, menyatukan, dan menebus.

Merah, putih, dan biru, warna-warna yang berani,
Mewakili keberanian, kemurnian, dan kebenaran.
Bintang-bintang yang berkilauan, lima puluh yang cerah,
Menunjukkan persatuan, kekuatan, dan cahaya.

Dari Bunker Hill hingga Gettysburg,
Dari Pearl Harbor hingga 9/11,
Bendera telah berkibar tinggi,
Melindungi kita dari bahaya, membuat kita tetap bebas.

Di medan perang dan di tanah air,
Bendera telah menjadi suar harapan.
Ini telah menginspirasi para pahlawan,
Dan menyatukan kita sebagai satu bangsa.

Jadi mari kita hormati Bendera Grand Ol,
Dengan hormat dan kebanggaan.
Semoga berkibar selamanya,
Simbol kebebasan kita, harapan kita, dan impian kita.
jav.Rep_En:
Flag of the Grand Ol
Oh, the flag of the Grand Ol, waving proudly,
On the land we love, from sea to sea shining.
A symbol of freedom, hope, and dreams,
A flag that inspires, unites, and redeems.
Red, white, and blue, bold colors,
It represents courage, purity, and truth.
The shining stars, the fifty bright ones,
It shows unity, strength, and light.
From Bunker Hill to Gettysburg,
From Pearl Harbor to 9-11,
The flag has flown high,
Protect us from danger, keep us free.
On the battlefield and in the homeland,
The flag has become a beacon of hope.
This has inspired the heroes,
And unite us as one nation.
So let's honor the flag of the Grand Ol,
With respect and pride.
May it shine forever,
It is a symbol of our freedom, our hopes, and our dreams.

nob.Qst: som skrev du er en grand ol flagg
nob.Rep:
Oh, say, kan du se, ved den første gry av morgenlyset,
Hva så stolt vi hyllet, ved kveldens siste glød?
Var det stjernebanneren, så bredt og så lyst,
Over murens bryst vi så så gallantly streaming?

Og hvor er den hær som i stolthet så ned,
Over rampartens land, hvor vi så modig kjempet?
Hver stjerne og stripe var fortsatt der,
Over det frie landets hjem, av de modige og de frie!

Oh, si, kan du se, ved den første gry av morgenlyset,
Hva så stolt vi hyllet, ved kveldens siste glød?
Var det stjernebanneren, så bredt og så lyst,
Over murens bryst vi så så gallantly streaming?

Og hvor er den hær som i stolthet så ned,

Hver stjerne og stripe var fortsatt der,
Over det frie landets hjem, av de modige og de frie!

Og denne stjernebanneren skal alltid veie,
Over landet av de frie og hjemmet til de modige!
Må det for alltid bølge over det land vi elsker,
Beskytt det mot fiender, utenfor og innenfor,
La det for alltid veie over det land vi elsker,
Beskytt det mot fiender, utenfor og innenfor!

Oh, say, can you see, at the first dawn of dawn,
What then did we proudly hail, at the evening's last glow?

And where is the army that in pride looked down,
Over the rampart land, where we saw bravely fought?
Every star and strip was still there,
Over the home of the free country, of the brave and the free!

And this star banner shall always weigh,
Over the land of the free and the home of the brave!

Let it forever weigh on the land we love,

urd.Qst: "اس نے لکھا ہے کہ ""آپ ایک عظیم پرانے پرچم ہیں."""
urd.Rep:
یہ اقتباس "دی گریٹ گیٹسبی" ناول سے ہے، جو ایف سکاٹ فٹزجیرلڈ نے لکھا ہے۔ یہ ڈیزی بوچانن द्वारा निक गेरावे को लिखे गए पत्र से है।

पूरा उद्धरण इस प्रकार है:

> "आप एक महान पुराने झंडे हैं, आप जानते हैं। हमेशा हवा में लहराते हुए, चाहे कुछ भी हो।"

इस उद्धरण में, डेज़ी निक की प्रशंसा कर रही है कि वह हमेशा वफादार और भरोसेमंद रहा है, भले ही जीवन ने उसके लिए कितनी भी चुनौतियाँ क्यों न फेंकी हों। वह उसे एक "महान पुराने झंडे" के रूप में वर्णित करती है, जो एक ऐसा प्रतीक है जो हमेशा लहराता रहता है, चाहे कुछ भी हो।
urd.Rep_En:
The quote is from the novel The Great Gatsby by F. Scott Fitzgerald. It's from a letter written by Daisy Buchanan to G. Nickaraway.
The full quote is:
"You're a great old flag, you know. Always waving in the air, no matter what".
In this quote, Daisy praises Nick for always being loyal and trustworthy, no matter how many challenges life throws at him. She describes him as a "great old flag", a symbol that always waves, no matter what.

jav.Rep:
**The Cliffs of Madness**

**Logline:**

A group of scientists and explorers embark on a perilous expedition to the uncharted Cliffs of Madness, where they encounter ancient horrors and the limits of human sanity.

**Synopsis:**

In the remote and desolate Antarctic, a team of scientists led by Dr. William Dyer (Willem Dafoe) and his assistant, Danforth (Ezra Miller), set out to investigate the mysterious Cliffs of Madness. Accompanying them are a geologist, Lake (Tom Hardy), and a photographer, Pabodie (Saoirse Ronan).

As they approach the cliffs, they encounter strange and unsettling phenomena. The landscape shifts and warps, and they hear eerie whispers in the wind. Undeterred, they press on, driven by a thirst for knowledge and the allure of the unknown.

However, as they delve deeper into the cliffs, they stumble upon ancient ruins and disturbing artifacts. They also encounter grotesque creatures that defy description, their minds slowly unraveling under the weight of the horrors they witness.

As the expedition descends into chaos, Dyer and Danforth become separated from the others. They find themselves trapped in a labyrinthine cave system, where they are confronted by the ultimate manifestation of madness.

In a desperate struggle for survival, Dyer and Danforth must confront their own inner demons and the terrifying secrets that lie hidden within the Cliffs of Madness.

**Themes:**

* The limits of human sanity
* The dangers of unchecked ambition
* The cosmic insignificance of humanity
* The power of fear and the unknown

**Cast:**

* Willem Dafoe as Dr. William Dyer
* Ezra Miller as Danforth
* Tom Hardy as Lake
* Saoirse Ronan as Pabodie

**Director:**

* Guillermo del Toro

**Release Date:**

* October 2024

jpn.Rep:
How to get the value of a specific key from a JSON object in Java?

I have a JSON object in Java and I want to get the value of a specific key from it. For example, if I have the following JSON object: { "name": "John Doe", "age": 30, "city": "New York" } And I want to get the value of the "name" key, I would do the following: String name = jsonObject.getString("name"); This would return the value "John Doe". How can I do this for a key that is not known in advance? For example, if I have the following JSON object: { "key1": "value1", "key2": "value2", "key3": "value3" } And I want to get the value of the key "key2", I would do the following: String value = jsonObject.getString("key2"); This would return the value "value2". However, if I don't know the key in advance, how can I get the value? [Answer 1] You can use the keySet() method to get a set of all the keys in the JSON object, and then iterate over the set to find the key you're looking for. For example, the following code would get the value of the "key2" key from the JSON object: Set keys = jsonObject.keySet(); for (String key : keys) { if (key.equals("key2")) { String value = jsonObject.getString(key); // Do something with the value } } You can also use the containsKey() method to check if a key exists in the JSON object before trying to get its value. For example, the following code would check if the "key2" key exists in the JSON object, and if it does, it would get its value: if (jsonObject.containsKey("key2")) { String value = jsonObject.getString("key2"); // Do something with the value } [Answer 2] You can use the keySet() method to get a set of all the keys in the JSON object, and then iterate over the set to find the key you're looking for. For example, the following code would get the value of the "key2" key from the JSON object: Set keys = jsonObject.keySet(); for (String key : keys) { if (key.equals("key2")) { String value = jsonObject.getString(key); // Do something with the value } } You can also use the containsKey() method to check if a key exists in the JSON object before trying to get its value. For example, the following code would check if the "key2" key exists in the JSON object, and if it does, it would get its value: if (jsonObject.containsKey("key2")) { String value = jsonObject.getString("key2"); // Do something with the value }

mkd.Qst: "Како се снима ""Клифовите на лудилото""?"
mkd.Rep:
**Снимање филма "Клифови лудила"**

**1. Предпродукција**

* Развијање сценарија
* Окупљање глумачке екипе и екипе
* Локацијско извиђање
* Дизајн продукције
* Костимографија и шминка

**2. Продукција**

**Снимање:**

* Снимање сцена у редоследу како су написане у сценарију
* Коришћење различитих техника снимања, укључујући ручне камере, стативе и дронове
* Управљање осветљењем, звуком и камером

**Глума:**

* Глумци тумаче своје улоге и изводе дијалоге
* Режисер руководи глумцима и даје им упутства

**Технички аспекти:**

* Оператери камере снимају слике
* Инжењери звука снимају звук
* Дизајнери продукције креирају и одржавају сценографију
* Костимографи и шминкери облаче и шминкају глумце

**3. Постпродукција**

**Монтажа:**

* Монтери филма састављају снимљене снимке у кохерентну причу
* Уклањају непотребне снимке и додају прелазе

**Ефекти:**

* Визуелни ефекти се додају да би се створили реалистични или фантастични елементи
* Звучни ефекти и музика се додају да би се створила атмосфера и емоционални утицај

**Корекција боја:**

* Боје филма се прилагођавају да би се створио жељени изглед и осећај

**Миксање звука:**

* Звучни ефекти, музика и дијалози се мешају и балансирају да би се створио кохезиван звучни пејзаж

**4. Дистрибуција**

* Филм се дистрибуира у биоскопе, на стриминг платформе или на ДВД/Блу-реј
* Промотивне кампање се спроводе да би се привукла публика

eng.Qst: when does trick or treat start and end
eng.Rep:
**Start:**

* **United States:** Typically between 5:30 pm and 7:00 pm on October 31st.

* **Canada:** Varies by municipality, but generally between 5:00 pm and 9:00 pm on October 31st.

* **Other countries:** Varies widely, but often starts in the late afternoon or early evening on October 31st.

**End:**

* **United States:** Typically between 8:00 pm and 9:30 pm on October 31st.

* **Canada:** Varies by municipality, but generally between 8:00 pm and 10:00 pm on October 31st.

* **Other countries:** Varies widely, but often ends around 9:00 pm or 10:00 pm on October 31st.

**Note:**

* Some municipalities may have specific ordinances or guidelines regarding trick-or-treating hours.
* It is always advisable to check with local authorities for the exact start and end times in your area.

afr.Qst: Wanneer begin en eindig trick or treat?
afr.Rep:
De traditionele tijden voor trick or treat zijn:

* **Begin:** Zonsondergang of 18.00 uur, afhankelijk van wat eerder is
* **Einde:** 20.00 uur of 21.00 uur, afhankelijk van de lokale gewoonten
afr.Rep_En:
The traditional times for trick or treat are:
Start: Sunset or 6:00 p.m., whichever comes first
End: 8 or 9 p.m., depending on local customs

arb.Qst: متى يبدأ الحيل أو المعالجة وينتهي
arb.Rep:
**بداية الحيل أو المعالجة:**

* 31 أكتوبر (ليلة عيد جميع القديسين)

**نهاية الحيل أو المعالجة:**

* عادةً ما تنتهي في وقت مبكر من المساء، حوالي الساعة 8 أو 9 مساءً.
arb.Rep_En:
Beginning of the trick:
October 31st, the night of All Saints'Day.
End of the trick:
They usually end early in the evening, around 8 or 9 p.m.

ary.Qst: وقتاش تبدأ الحيلة أو الحلوى وتنتهي؟
ary.Rep:
**وقت بدء الحيلة أو الحلوى:**

* عادةً ما تبدأ الحيلة أو الحلوى عند غروب الشمس أو بعده بقليل.
* في بعض المناطق، قد تبدأ في وقت مبكر من الساعة 5 مساءً.

**وقت انتهاء الحيلة أو الحلوى:**

* عادةً ما تنتهي الحيلة أو الحلوى في حوالي الساعة 9 مساءً أو 10 مساءً.
* في بعض المناطق، قد تستمر حتى الساعة 11 مساءً أو منتصف الليل.

**ملاحظة:** قد تختلف أوقات بدء وانتهاء الحيلة أو الحلوى حسب المنطقة والتقاليد المحلية. يُنصح بالتحقق مع السلطات المحلية أو الجيران لمعرفة الأوقات الدقيقة في منطقتك.
ary.Rep_En:
It's time to start the trick or treat:
The trick or treat usually starts at sunset or shortly thereafter.
In some areas, it may start as early as 5 pm.
The time of the end of the trick or treat:
The trick or treat usually ends around 9pm or 10pm.
In some areas, it may continue until 11 pm or midnight.
Note: The start and end times of the trick or treat may vary depending on the region and local traditions. It is advisable to check with local authorities or neighbors to find out the exact times in your area.

arz.Qst: امتى بيبدأ ويخلص الحيلة أو الحلوى؟

**بداية الحيلة أو الحلوى:**

**نهاية الحيلة أو الحلوى:**

* عادةً ما تنتهي في وقت مبكر من المساء، حوالي الساعة 8 أو 9 مساءً
arz.Rep_En:
The beginning of a trick or treat:
October 31, on the eve of All Saints' Day
End of the trick or treat:
It usually ends early in the evening, around 8 or 9 pm

ben.Qst: কখন ট্রিক বা চিকিত্সা শুরু এবং শেষ হয়
ben.Rep:
**ট্রিক বা চিকিত্সা শুরু:**

* **সাধারণত:** সূর্যাস্তের পরে (সাধারণত সন্ধ্যা 6টা থেকে 8টার মধ্যে)

**ট্রিক বা চিকিত্সা শেষ:**

* **সাধারণত:** রাত 9টা থেকে 10টার মধ্যে

**অঞ্চলভেদে পরিবর্তন:**

ট্রিক বা চিকিত্সার সঠিক সময় অঞ্চলভেদে পরিবর্তিত হতে পারে। কিছু সম্প্রদায়ে, এটি সূর্যাস্তের আগে শুরু হতে পারে, যখন অন্যগুলিতে এটি পরে শুরু হতে পারে।

**সুরক্ষা বিবেচনা:**

* বাচ্চাদের সঙ্গে একজন প্রাপ্তবয়স্ক থাকা উচিত।
* বাচ্চাদের উজ্জ্বল রঙের পোশাক পরতে উৎসাহিত করুন যাতে ড্রাইভাররা তাদের সহজে দেখতে পায়।
* বাচ্চাদের তাদের বাড়ির কাছাকাছি থাকতে বলুন এবং অপরিচিতদের কাছ থেকে ক্যান্ডি গ্রহণ না করতে বলুন।
ben.Rep_En:
Trick or Treatment Begins:
Usually: After sunset (usually between 6pm and 8pm)
The trick is over:
Usually: Between 9 and 10 p.m.
Changes by region:
The exact time of the trick or treatment may vary by region. In some communities, it may begin before sunset, while in others it may begin later.
Security considerations:
An adult should be with the children.
Encourage children to wear brightly colored clothing so that drivers can easily see them.
Tell children to stay close to their homes and not accept candy from strangers.

cmn.Qst: 什么时候开始和结束
cmn.Rep:
**开始：**

* 宇宙大爆炸：约 138 亿年前
* 地球形成：约 45 亿年前
* 生命起源：约 35 亿年前
* 人类进化：约 200 万年前
* 文明诞生：约 5000 年前

**结束：**

* 地球生命灭绝：约 10 亿年后（太阳耗尽燃料）
* 太阳系灭绝：约 50 亿年后（太阳变成红巨星）
* 银河系灭绝：约 1000 亿年后（银河系与仙女座星系合并）
* 宇宙大收缩：约 100 万亿年后（宇宙停止膨胀并开始收缩）
* 宇宙大终结：约 10^100 年后（宇宙收缩到一个奇点）
cmn.Rep_En:
The beginning:
The Big Bang: about 13.8 billion years ago
The Earth formed about 4.5 billion years ago.
The origin of life: about 3.5 billion years ago
Human evolution: about two million years ago
The birth of civilization: about 5,000 years ago
The end:
Extinction of life on Earth: about 1 billion years later (sun runs out of fuel)
Extinction of the solar system: about 5 billion years later (the sun becomes a red giant)
Extinction of the Milky Way: about 100 billion years later (Merger of the Milky Way and the Centauri galaxy)
The Great Contraction of the Universe: about 100 trillion years later (the universe stops expanding and begins to contract)
The end of the universe: about 10100 years from now (the universe has shrunk to a singularity)

dan.Qst: Hvornår begynder og slutter "trick or treat"
dan.Rep:
Trick or treat-traditionen varierer fra land til land, men generelt begynder og slutter den på følgende tidspunkter:

**Begyndelse:**

* **USA:** Solnedgang eller skumring (ca. 17:00-18:00) den 31. oktober
* **Canada:** Solnedgang eller skumring (ca. 17:00-18:00) den 31. oktober
* **Storbritannien:** Solnedgang eller skumring (ca. 17:00-18:00) den 31. oktober
* **Irland:** Solnedgang eller skumring (ca. 17:00-18:00) den 31. oktober

**Slut:**

* **USA:** Omkring kl. 21:00-22:00
* **Canada:** Omkring kl. 21:00-22:00
* **Storbritannien:** Omkring kl. 21:00-22:00
* **Irland:** Omkring kl. 21:00-22:00

Det er dog vigtigt at bemærke, at nogle områder kan have deres egne lokale traditioner og tidspunkter for trick or treat. Det er altid bedst at tjekke med lokale myndigheder eller samfundscentre for at få de mest opdaterede oplysninger.
dan.Rep_En:
The trick or treat tradition varies from country to country, but generally begins and ends at the following times:
The beginning:
United States: Sunset or dusk (approximately 17:00-18:00) on October 31
Canada: Sunset or dusk (approximately 17:00-18:00) on October 31
UK: Sunset or dusk (approximately 17:00-18:00) on 31 October
Ireland: sunset or dusk (approximately 17:00-18:00) on 31 October
End of the day:
United States: around 21:00-22:00
Canada: around 21:00-22:00
UK: around 21:00
Ireland: around 21:00-22:00
It is important to note, however, that some areas may have their own local traditions and times for trick or treat.It is always best to check with local authorities or community centres for the most up-to-date information.

deu.Qst: Wann beginnt und endet Trick or Treat?
deu.Rep:
Die genauen Zeiten für Trick or Treat variieren je nach Region und Tradition, aber im Allgemeinen gilt:

**Beginn:**

* **31. Oktober:** In den meisten Ländern beginnt Trick or Treat am Abend des 31. Oktober, dem Vorabend von Allerheiligen.
* **Sonnenuntergang:** In einigen Gegenden beginnt Trick or Treat erst nach Sonnenuntergang.

**Ende:**

* **20:00 Uhr:** In vielen Gegenden endet Trick or Treat um 20:00 Uhr.
* **21:00 Uhr:** In einigen Gegenden wird Trick or Treat bis 21:00 Uhr verlängert.
* **22:00 Uhr:** In seltenen Fällen kann Trick or Treat bis 22:00 Uhr dauern.

Es ist jedoch wichtig zu beachten, dass diese Zeiten nur allgemeine Richtlinien sind und je nach örtlichen Bräuchen und Sicherheitsbedenken variieren können. Es wird empfohlen, sich bei den örtlichen Behörden oder Gemeindezentren nach den genauen Zeiten für Trick or Treat zu erkundigen.
deu.Rep_En:
The exact times for Trick or Treat vary by region and tradition, but in general:
The beginning:
October 31: In most countries, Trick or Treat begins on the evening of October 31, the eve of All Saints' Day.
Sunset: In some areas, Trick or Treat doesn't start until after sunset.
The end:
In many areas, Trick or Treat ends at 20:00
Time: In some areas, Trick or Treat will be extended until 21:00 hours.
Time: In rare cases, Trick or Treat can last until 22:00 hours.
However, it is important to note that these times are only general guidelines and may vary depending on local customs and safety concerns. It is recommended that you inquire with local authorities or community centres about the exact times for Trick or Treat.

**Koniec:**

**Poznámky:**

* Niektoré mestá a obce môžu mať mierne odlišné časy začiatku a konca.
* V niektorých oblastiach sa trik alebo liečba môže konať aj v iné dni, napríklad 30. októbra alebo 1. novembra.
* Je dôležité skontrolovať miestne predpisy a zvyky, aby ste sa uistili, že dodržiavate správne časy.

Some cities and towns may have slightly different start and end times.

vie.Qst: khi nào trò lừa đảo hoặc xử lý bắt đầu và kết thúc
vie.Rep:
**Bắt đầu của trò lừa đảo hoặc xử lý**

* Khi một cá nhân hoặc tổ chức cố tình đưa ra thông tin sai lệch hoặc che giấu sự thật để đạt được lợi ích tài chính hoặc lợi ích khác.
* Khi một cá nhân hoặc tổ chức sử dụng các chiến thuật bất hợp pháp hoặc không đạo đức để thao túng hoặc ép buộc người khác hành động theo ý muốn của họ.

**Kết thúc của trò lừa đảo hoặc xử lý**

* Khi trò lừa đảo hoặc xử lý bị phát hiện và các bên liên quan bị trừng phạt.
* Khi trò lừa đảo hoặc xử lý không còn hiệu quả hoặc không còn có lợi cho những kẻ thực hiện.
* Khi các biện pháp phòng ngừa và giáo dục được thực hiện để ngăn chặn các trò lừa đảo hoặc xử lý tương tự trong tương lai.

**Lưu ý:**

* Thời gian bắt đầu và kết thúc của một trò lừa đảo hoặc xử lý có thể khác nhau tùy thuộc vào mức độ phức tạp, phạm vi và hiệu quả của nó.
* Một số trò lừa đảo hoặc xử lý có thể kéo dài trong nhiều năm hoặc thậm chí hàng thập kỷ trước khi bị phát hiện.
* Ngay cả khi một trò lừa đảo hoặc xử lý đã kết thúc, tác động của nó có thể vẫn còn trong một thời gian dài sau đó.
vie.Rep_En:
Start of the scam or handling
When an individual or organization deliberately misrepresents or conceals the truth for financial or other gain.
When an individual or organization uses illegal or unethical tactics to manipulate or coerce others to act on their behalf.
The end of the trick or treat
When cheating or handling is detected and the parties involved are punished.
When the trick or treatment is no longer effective or beneficial to the perpetrators.
When preventive and educational measures are taken to prevent future scams or similar dealings.
Please note:
The start and end times of a scam or transaction can vary depending on its complexity, scope and effectiveness.
Some scams or deals can go on for years or even decades before being detected.
Even when a scam or deal is over, its effects can remain for a long time afterwards.

yue.Qst: 咩時候開始同結束呢?
yue.Rep:
**開始時間：**

* 1914 年 7 月 28 日：奧匈帝國向塞爾維亞宣戰，標誌著第一次世界大戰的開始。

**結束時間：**

* 1918 年 11 月 11 日：德國與協約國簽署康邊停戰協定，標誌著第一次世界大戰的結束。
yue.Rep_En:
Starting time:
1914 7 28: The Austro-Hungarian Empire declares war on Serbia, marking the beginning of the First World War
The end of time:
1918 11th month 11th day: Germany and the Treaty of Versailles sign the armistice agreement, the end of the First World War as a sign

zlm.Qst: bila trik atau merawat bermula dan berakhir
zlm.Rep:
**Trik atau Merawat Bermula**

* **31 Oktober, sore hari:** Anak-anak mulai mengenakan kostum dan pergi dari rumah ke rumah untuk meminta permen.
* **31 Oktober, malam hari:** Puncak aktivitas trik atau merawat, dengan anak-anak yang berkeliling mengumpulkan permen sebanyak mungkin.

**Trik atau Merawat Berakhir**

* **31 Oktober, sekitar pukul 9 malam:** Sebagian besar anak-anak telah selesai trik atau merawat dan kembali ke rumah.
* **31 Oktober, sekitar pukul 10 malam:** Sebagian besar rumah telah kehabisan permen dan menutup lampu mereka, menandakan berakhirnya trik atau merawat.
zlm.Rep_En:
Trick or Treatment Begins
On October 31, in the afternoon, children began to dress up and go from house to house asking for candy.
October 31st, night: Peak of trick or treat activity, with kids going around collecting as many candy as possible.
Trick or Treat Ends
October 31st, around 9pm: Most of the children have finished their tricks or treatments and returned home.
October 31st, around 10pm: Most homes have run out of candy and turn off their lights, signifying the end of the trick or treat.

cat.Qst: Ella Woods en Broadway
cat.Rep:
**Ella Woods: El Musical**

**Sinopsis:**

Ella Woods, la icónica rubia de "Legalmente Rubia", llega a Broadway en un nuevo y emocionante musical. Después de ser rechazada por su novio Warner Huntington III por no ser lo suficientemente "seria", Ella se embarca en un viaje de autodescubrimiento y empoderamiento. Se inscribe en la Facultad de Derecho de Harvard para demostrarle a Warner que es más que una cara bonita.

**Elenco:**

* Laura Bell Bundy como Ella Woods
* Christian Borle como Emmett Forrest
* Kate Rockwell como Paulette Bonafonté
* Michael Rupert como Profesor Callahan
* Orfeh como Brooke Wyndham
* Andy Karl como Warner Huntington III

**Canciones:**

* "Omigod You Guys"
* "What You Want"
* "Bend and Snap"
* "Legally Blonde"
* "So Much Better"
* "There! Right There!"
* "Whipped into Shape"
* "Paulette's Reprise"
* "Ireland"
* "Gay or European?"
* "Serious"
* "Legally Blonde (Reprise)"

**Equipo creativo:**

* Libro: Heather Hach
* Música y letra: Laurence O'Keefe y Nell Benjamin
* Dirección: Jerry Mitchell
* Coreografía: Jerry Mitchell
* Escenografía: David Rockwell
* Vestuario: Gregg Barnes
* Iluminación: Kenneth Posner
* Sonido: Brian Ronan

**Fechas y lugar:**

* Estreno: 25 de abril de 2007
* Cierre: 19 de octubre de 2008
* Teatro: Palace Theatre, Broadway

**Premios y nominaciones:**

* 7 nominaciones a los premios Tony, incluyendo Mejor Musical
* 10 nominaciones a los premios Drama Desk, incluyendo Mejor Musical
* Ganador del premio Drama Desk a la Mejor Actriz en un Musical (Laura Bell Bundy)

**Recepción de la crítica:**

"Ella Woods: El Musical" recibió críticas mixtas de los críticos. Algunos elogiaron su energía y humor, mientras que otros criticaron su trama predecible y sus personajes unidimensionales. Sin embargo, el musical fue un éxito comercial, recaudando más de 140 millones de dólares durante su presentación en Broadway.

mkd.Qst: "Од ""Ел Вудс"" на Бродвеј"
mkd.Rep:
**Од "Ел Вудс" на Бродвеј**

Уђите у свет ружичасте и правде са "Од Ел Вудс", музичком комедијом која је освојила Бродвеј.

**Прича**

Пратите Ел Вудс, модну икону и дипломирану правницу са Харварда, док се бори за правду и доказује да је више од само лепог лица. Када њеног дечка Ворнера Хантингтона III одбије након што је сазнао да иде на Харвард, Ел одлучује да га освоји тако што ће се сама уписати на правни факултет.

**Ликови**

* **Ел Вудс:** Модна икона и дипломирана правница са Харварда која доказује да је лепота и памет могу ићи руку под руку.
* **Емет Форест:** Ел-ин пријатељ и сарадник на правном факултету који јој помаже да се прилагоди новом окружењу.
* **Вивијен Кенсингтон:** Амбициозна и конкурентна студенткиња права која је Ел-ина ривалка.
* **Калахан:** Професор права који је скептичан према Ел-иним способностима, али на крају постаје њен ментор.
* **Ворнер Хантингтон III:** Ел-ин бивши дечко који је одбио да је запроси јер није довољно "озбиљна".

**Музика и текстови**

Музика и текстови за "Од Ел Вудс" написали су Лори О'Киф, Нел Бенџамин и Џејсон Роберт Браун. Музика је мешавина поп, рока и Бродвејских мелодија, а текстови су духовити и духовити.

**Награде и признања**

"Од Ел Вудс" је освојио бројне награде, укључујући:

* Три награде Тони, укључујући најбољи мјузикл
* Две награде Греми за најбољи мјузички театарски албум и најбољу оригиналну песму ("So Much Better")
* Награда Драма Деск за најбољи мјузикл

**Зашто видети "Од Ел Вудс"?**

"Од Ел Вудс" је забаван и узбудљив мјузикл који ће вас насмејати, натерати вас да певате и инспирисати вас да верујете у себе. Са својим шармантним ликовима, заразном музиком и поруком о самоприхватању, "Од Ел Вудс" је савршен избор за ноћ забаве и инспирације.
mkd.Rep_En:
From "Elle Woods" on Broadway
The world's pink and truth are from The Elders, a musical comedy that won a Broadway.
The story
Following Elwood, a fashion icon and Harvard law graduate, as she fights for justice and proves to be more than just a pretty face. When her boyfriend, Warner Huntington III, refuses after learning that he wants to go to Harvard, Elwood decides to win him over by enrolling herself in law school.
Characters
El Woods: A fashion icon and Harvard law graduate who proves that beauty and intelligence can go hand in hand.
Emmett Forest: A friend and associate at the law school who helps her adjust to her new surroundings.
Vivian Kensington: An ambitious and competitive law student who is Elina's rival.
Callahan: A law professor who is skeptical of El-Inim's abilities, but eventually becomes her mentor.
Warner Huntington III: An ex-boyfriend who refused to ask because she wasn't "serious enough".
Music and lyrics
The music and lyrics for "Od El Woods" were written by Laurie O'Keefe, Nell Benjamin and Jason Robert Brown. The music is a mixture of pop, rock and Broadway melodies, and the lyrics are soulful and spiritual.
Awards and recognitions
"From El Woods" won numerous awards, including:
Three Tony Awards, including best musical
Two Grammy Awards for best musical theater album and best original song ("So Much Better")
Drama Desk award for best musical
Why see "From El Woods"?
"From El Wood" is a fun and exciting musical that will make you laugh, make you sing and inspire you to believe in yourself. With its charming characters, infectious music and a message of self-acceptance, "From El Wood" is the perfect choice for nighttime entertainment and inspiration.

swh.Qst: mashabiki wanachagua: Elle Woods on Broadway
swh.Rep:
**Mashabiki Wanachagua: Elle Woods on Broadway**

**Utangulizi:**
Elle Woods on Broadway ni mchezo wa muziki wa vichekesho unaotokana na filamu ya 2001 ya jina moja. Mchezo huo unamfuata Elle Woods, mwanasheria wa mitindo ambaye anaacha maisha yake ya kifahari huko California ili kumfuata mpenzi wake wa zamani hadi Shule ya Sheria ya Harvard.

**Wahusika Wakuu:**
* **Elle Woods:** Mwanasheria wa mitindo ambaye anajiunga na Shule ya Sheria ya Harvard ili kumfuata mpenzi wake wa zamani.
* **Emmett Forrest:** Mpenzi wa zamani wa Elle ambaye anajiunga na Shule ya Sheria ya Harvard.
* **Paulette Bonafonté:** Mtaalamu wa urembo ambaye anakuwa rafiki wa Elle.
* **Vivienne Kensington:** Mwanafunzi mwenzake wa Elle ambaye anakuwa mpinzani wake.
* **Professor Callahan:** Profesa wa sheria ambaye ana shaka juu ya uwezo wa Elle.

**Njama:**
Baada ya kutengwa na mpenzi wake wa zamani, Emmett, Elle anaamua kumfuata hadi Shule ya Sheria ya Harvard ili kuthibitisha thamani yake. Licha ya kukabiliwa na ubaguzi na mashaka, Elle anaonyesha kuwa yeye ni mwanafunzi mwenye akili na mwenye nia. Anajiunga na kikundi cha sorority, anakuwa rafiki na Paulette, na hatimaye anamshinda Professor Callahan.

**Nyimbo:**
Mchezo huo una nyimbo nyingi za kukumbukwa, ikiwa ni pamoja na:
* "Sorority Girl"
* "Legally Blonde"
* "What You Want"
* "Omigod You Guys"
* "Bend and Snap"

**Mapokezi:**
Elle Woods on Broadway imepokea mapokezi chanya kutoka kwa wakosoaji na watazamaji. Mchezo huo umekuwa ukichezwa kwa mafanikio tangu 2007 na umepokea tuzo nyingi, ikiwa ni pamoja na Tuzo tatu za Tony.

**Mashabiki Wanachagua:**
Mashabiki wa Elle Woods on Broadway wanapenda mchezo huo kwa sababu ya ujumbe wake wa uwezeshaji, wahusika wake wanaovutia, na nyimbo zake za kukumbukwa. Mchezo huo ni ukumbusho kwamba mtu yeyote anaweza kufikia malengo yake, bila kujali jinsi watu wengine wanavyowachukulia.

**Hitimisho:**
Elle Woods on Broadway ni mchezo wa muziki wa vichekesho unaohamasisha na wa kufurahisha ambao umekuwa ukifurahisha watazamaji kwa zaidi ya muongo mmoja. Ujumbe wake wa uwezeshaji, wahusika wake wanaovutia, na nyimbo zake za kukumbukwa zimeifanya kuwa moja ya michezo maarufu zaidi ya Broadway.
swh.Rep_En:
Fans are choosing: Elle Woods on Broadway
The introduction is:
"Elle Woods on Broadway" is a musical comedy based on the 2001 film of the same name, which follows Elle Woods, a fashion lawyer who leaves her luxurious life in California to follow her ex-boyfriend to Harvard Law School.
Key players:
Elle Woods: A fashion lawyer who joins Harvard Law School to follow in her ex-boyfriend's footsteps.
Emmett Forrest: Elle's ex-boyfriend who is attending Harvard Law School.
Paulette Bonafonté: A beautician who becomes friends with Elle.
Vivienne Kensington: A classmate of Elle who becomes her rival.
Professor Callahan: A law professor who has doubts about Elle's ability.
The plot:
After being rejected by her ex-boyfriend, Emmett, Elle decides to follow him to Harvard Law School to prove her worth.Despite facing prejudice and suspicion, Elle shows herself to be a bright and determined student.She joins a sorority group, befriends Paulette, and eventually defeats Professor Callahan.
The songs:
The game has many memorable songs, including:
"Sorority girl" is
"Legally Blonde"
"What You Want"
"Oh my God You Guys"
"Bend and Snap"
Reception of the event:
"Elle Woods on Broadway" has received positive reviews from critics and audiences alike, and the play has been successfully performed since 2007 and has received numerous awards, including three Tony Awards.
Fans are choosing:
Fans of "Elle" love the show for its empowering message, compelling characters, and memorable songs, a reminder that anyone can achieve their goals no matter how others view them.
The Conclusion:
"Elle on Broadway" is a moving and moving musical that has delighted audiences for more than a decade, and its compelling message, compelling characters, and memorable songs have made it one of Broadway's most popular plays.

ary.Qst: فشنو البيئة شكلت الجرانيت الزرادشتي؟
ary.Rep:
لم تشكل فشنو البيئة الجرانيت الزرادشتي.

تشكل الجرانيت الزرادشتي من خلال عمليات جيولوجية طبيعية، بما في ذلك:

* **التبلور من الصهارة:** تشكلت الصهارة المنصهرة تحت سطح الأرض وتبردت ببطء، مما سمح للمعادن بالبلورة وتكوين الجرانيت.
* **التحويل الحراري:** تعرضت الصهارة المنصهرة لدرجات حرارة عالية وضغط، مما أدى إلى تحويل المعادن الموجودة فيها إلى معادن جديدة، بما في ذلك الكوارتز والفلسبار والميكا.
* **التبريد والتصلب:** عندما بردت الصهارة وتصلبت، تشكلت بلورات الجرانيت المتشابكة التي نراها اليوم.
ary.Rep_En:
The environment was not formed by the emerald granite.
Zoroastrian granite is formed by natural geological processes, including:
Crystallization of magma: Melted magma formed beneath the earth's surface and slowly cooled, allowing metals to crystallize and form granite.
Thermal conversion: Molten magma has been exposed to high temperatures and pressure, resulting in the conversion of its minerals into new metals, including quartz, feldspar, and mica.
Cooling and hardening: When the magma cooled and hardened, the intricate granite crystals we see today were formed.

cmn_Hant.Qst: 石的形成 石的形成是何種環境下
cmn_Hant.Rep:
**石的形成環境**

石頭的形成需要以下環境條件：

* **礦物質來源：**岩石形成所需的礦物質必須存在於環境中，例如矽、鋁、鈣、鎂和鐵。
* **溶液：**礦物質必須溶解在水中或其他溶劑中，以便它們可以移動和沉積。
* **沉積環境：**溶液必須沉積在一個允許礦物質結晶和形成岩石的環境中。
* **壓力和溫度：**在某些情況下，壓力和溫度會影響岩石的形成。

**具體的石頭形成環境包括：**

* **沉積環境：**沉積岩是由沉積物（例如沙子、泥土和有機物質）在水體（例如海洋、湖泊或河流）中沉積和壓實而形成的。
* **火成環境：**火成岩是由熔岩或岩漿冷卻和結晶而形成的。
* **變質環境：**變質岩是由現有岩石在高溫、高壓或化學反應的影響下改變而形成的。
cmn_Hant.Rep_En:
The environment in which the stone is formed
The formation of the stone requires the following environmental conditions:
Mineral sources: Minerals needed to form rocks must exist in the environment, such as cobalt and iron ore.
Solvent: Minerals must be dissolved in water or other solvents so that they can move and settle.
Sedimentation environment: The solution must be deposited in an environment that allows the mineral to crystallize and form rock.
Pressure and temperature: In some circumstances, pressure and temperature affect the formation of rocks.
Specific rock-forming environments include:
Sedimentary environment: Sedimentary rocks are formed by the sedimentation and compression of sediment (e.g. sand, clay, and organic matter) in a body of water (e.g. ocean, lake, or river).
Fertilization environment: Fertilized rock is formed by the cooling and crystallization of lava or limestone.
Metamorphic environment: Metamorphic rock is formed by the change of existing rock under the influence of high temperature, high pressure, or chemical reactions.

jpn.Qst: ゾロアスターの花崗岩はどんな環境で形成されたのか?
jpn.Rep:
ゾロアスターの花崗岩は、以下の環境で形成されました。

* **大陸衝突帯:** 2つの大陸プレートが衝突して、地殻が厚くなり、圧力と温度が高くなった。
* **深部:** 地殻の深さ約10～30kmで形成された。
* **マグマ溜まり:** 溶融した岩石（マグマ）が地殻内に蓄積した。
* **ゆっくりとした冷却:** マグマがゆっくりと冷却し、結晶が形成された。
* **圧力と温度:** 高圧と高温により、結晶が密に詰まった。
jpn.Rep_En:
The Zoroastrian granite was formed in the following environment:
The continental collision zone: two continental plates collide, thickening the crust, increasing pressure and temperature.
Deep: Formed at a depth of about 10 to 30 kilometers.
Magma leakage: Molten rock (magma) accumulated in the earth.
Slow cooling: The magma slowly cooled and crystals formed.
Pressure and temperature: High pressure and high temperature cause the crystals to become tightly packed.

lao.Qst: ສິ່ງແວດລ້ອມຂອງ Zoroaster
lao.Rep:
**ภูมิศาสตร์**

* เกิดในเมือง Rhages (ปัจจุบันคือ Rey, อิหร่าน) ในภูมิภาค Media (ปัจจุบันคืออิหร่านตะวันตกเฉียงเหนือ)
* อาศัยอยู่ในพื้นที่ที่เป็นภูเขาและทุ่งหญ้ากว้างใหญ่
* มีอิทธิพลจากแม่น้ำ Tigris และ Euphrates

**วัฒนธรรม**

* เป็นส่วนหนึ่งของวัฒนธรรมอินโด-อิหร่าน
* ได้รับอิทธิพลจากศาสนาและความเชื่อของชาวเมโสโปเตเมียและชาวเปอร์เซียโบราณ
* สังคมแบ่งออกเป็นชนชั้นต่างๆ โดยมีนักบวชเป็นชนชั้นสูงสุด

**การเมือง**

* อาณาจักร Median กำลังเติบโตและมีอำนาจในช่วงเวลาของ Zoroaster
* อาณาจักรเปอร์เซียโบราณกำลังก่อตัวขึ้นในบริเวณใกล้เคียง
* Zoroaster มีปฏิสัมพันธ์กับกษัตริย์ Median และ Persian

**เศรษฐกิจ**

* เศรษฐกิจขึ้นอยู่กับการเกษตรและการเลี้ยงสัตว์
* การค้าขายมีความสำคัญ โดยเฉพาะกับชาวเมโสโปเตเมีย
* มีการใช้โลหะ เช่น ทองแดงและเหล็ก

**ศาสนา**

* Zoroaster ปฏิรูปความเชื่อทางศาสนาของชาวเปอร์เซียโบราณ
* เขาแนะนำแนวคิดของพระเจ้าองค์เดียวที่เรียกว่า Ahura Mazda
* ศาสนาของเขามีอิทธิพลอย่างมากต่อศาสนาอื่นๆ เช่น ศาสนายูดาย ศาสนาคริสต์ และศาสนาอิสลาม
lao.Rep_En:
Geography and geography
Born in Rhages (now Rey, Iran) in the Media region (now North Korea)
Living in a mountainous and lush area
Influenced by the Tigris and Euphrates
Culture and heritage
It is part of Indo-Iranian culture.
Influenced by the religion and beliefs of the Mesopotamians and the ancient Persians
Society is divided into classes, with the clergy as the highest class
Politics
The Median Empire was growing in power during the time of Zoroaster
The ancient Persian Empire was forming in the vicinity
Zoroaster interacted with the Medes and Persians
The economy
The economy depends on agriculture and animal husbandry
Trade is important, especially for the Mesopotamians
Metals such as copper, bronze, and iron are used
Religious beliefs
Zoroaster replicated the religious beliefs of the ancient Persians
He introduced the idea of one God called Ahura Mazda.
His religion had a profound influence on other religions, such as Judaism, Christianity, and Islam

bos.Rep:
**Must Be With Georgia**

(Стих 1)
У земљи сунца и песка,
Где океан нежно плеска,
Постоји песма, слатка и нежна,
О девојци по имену Џорџија.

(Рефрен)
Морам да будем са Џорџијом,
Мојом љубављу, мојом драгом,
Њена лепота заслепљује,
Моје срце јој припада.

(Стих 2)
Њене очи су као океан,
Дубоке и плаве, пуне тајни,
Њена коса је као злато,
Сјајна и мека, као свила.

(Рефрен)
Морам да будем са Џорџијом,
Мојом љубављу, мојом драгом,
Њена лепота заслепљује,
Моје срце јој припада.

(Бриџ)
У њеном осмеху налазим радост,
У њеном гласу чујем сладост,
Њена љубав је као сунце,
Топло и светло, увек ту.

(Стих 3)
Заједно ћемо истраживати свет,
Рука у руци, кроз сваки лет,
Њена љубав је мој компас,
Води ме кроз живот, без икаквог страха.

(Рефрен)
Морам да будем са Џорџијом,
Мојом љубављу, мојом драгом,
Њена лепота заслепљује,
Моје срце јој припада.

(Аутро)
У земљи сунца и песка,
Наша љубав ће вечно цветати,
Јер морам да будем са Џорџијом,
Мојом љубављу, мојом драгом.
bos.Rep_En:
Must be with Georgia
(Slow down 1)
In the land of sun and sand,
Where the ocean gently splashes,
There's a song, sweet and gentle,
About a girl named Georgia.
(Singing)
I have to be with Georgia,
My love, my darling,
Her beauty is dazzling,
My heart belongs to her.
(Quietly 2)

jpn.Qst: ジョージア・フロリダ・ライン
jpn.Rep:
**ジョージア・フロリダ・ライン**

**メンバー:**

* ブライアン・ケリー
* タイラー・ハブカ

**ジャンル:**

* カントリー
* ブロカントリー

**結成:**

* 2010年

**レーベル:**

* リパブリック・ナッシュビル

**代表曲:**

* "Cruise"
* "This Is How We Roll"
* "H.O.L.Y."
* "Meant to Be" (ベベ・レクサとのコラボレーション)
* "Simple"
* "Up Down" (フィフス・ハーモニーとのコラボレーション)
* "May We All"
* "Talk You Out of It"
* "Blessings"
* "I Love My Country"

**受賞歴:**

* アカデミー・オブ・カントリー・ミュージック賞：デュオ・オブ・ザ・イヤー（2014年、2015年、2016年）
* カントリー・ミュージック・アソシエーション賞：ボーカル・デュオ・オブ・ザ・イヤー（2014年、2015年、2016年）
* ビルボード・ミュージック・アワード：トップ・カントリー・デュオ/グループ（2014年、2015年、2016年）

**特徴:**

* ブロカントリーの代表的なデュオ
* キャッチーなメロディーと陽気な歌詞
* 伝統的なカントリー音楽とヒップホップやポップの影響を融合
* ライブパフォーマンスでの高いエネルギーと観客とのつながり
* ソーシャルメディアでの積極的な活動とファンとの交流

**経歴:**

ジョージア・フロリダ・ラインは、2010年にテネシー州ベルバックで結成されました。2012年にデビューEP「It'z Just What We Do」をリリースし、ヒット曲「Cruise」でブレイクしました。この曲はビルボード・ホット100で4位まで上昇し、カントリーチャートで1位を獲得しました。

その後、彼らは「This Is How We Roll」、「H.O.L.Y.」、「Meant to Be」などのヒット曲を次々とリリースし、カントリー音楽界でトップのデュオの地位を確立しました。彼らはまた、ベベ・レクサ、フィフス・ハーモニー、バックストリート・ボーイズなどのアーティストとコラボレーションしています。

ジョージア・フロリダ・ラインは、その陽気な音楽性とファンとのつながりで知られています。彼らは精力的にツアーを行い、ソーシャルメディアでファンと積極的に交流しています。

Georgia Florida Line was formed in Belback, Tennessee, in 2010 and released their debut EP, "It's Just What We Do", in 2012, and broke out with the hit song "Cruise", which peaked at number four on the Billboard Hot 100 and number one on the country charts.
Since then, they have released a series of hits such as "This Is How We Roll", "H.O.L.Y". and "Meant to Be", establishing themselves as one of the top duos in country music. They have also collaborated with artists such as Bebe Rexha, Fifth Harmony, and the Backstreet Boys.
Georgia Florida Line is known for their upbeat music and connection with their fans, and they're touring vigorously and actively interacting with their fans on social media.

jpn.Qst: 不死のメイド オブ オナーとは?
jpn.Rep:
「不死のメイド・オブ・オナー」は、ホラー映画や小説に登場する架空の存在です。

**特徴:**

* **不死性:** 傷つけたり殺したりすることができない。
* **忠誠心:** 花嫁に異常なほど忠実で、彼女を守るために何でもする。
* **超人的な力:** 怪力、敏捷性、治癒能力などの超人的な能力を持つ。
* **不気味な外見:** 蒼白な肌、血走った目、鋭い歯など、不気味な外見をしている。
* **花嫁への執着:** 花嫁に異常な執着を持ち、彼女を傷つける者には容赦なく報復する。

**起源:**

「不死のメイド・オブ・オナー」の起源は不明ですが、次のような説があります。

* 花嫁の嫉妬や不安から生まれた悪霊。
* 花嫁を守るために召喚された古代の守護霊。
* 花嫁の過去のトラウマや未解決の問題の具現化。

**役割:**

ホラー作品では、「不死のメイド・オブ・オナー」は通常、花嫁の安全を脅かす存在として描かれます。彼女は花嫁の敵を殺したり、花嫁の結婚式を妨害したりします。

**有名な例:**

* 映画「ブライズ・オブ・チャッキー」(1998年)のティファニー・バレンタイン
* 映画「ザ・リング」(2002年)のサマラ・モーガン
* 小説「キャリー」(1974年)のキャリー・ホワイト

yue.Qst: 邊個有更多嘅紀錄? Peyton Manning 抑或 Tom Brady
yue.Rep:
湯姆·布雷迪擁有比佩頓·曼寧更多的紀錄。

截至 2023 年 2 月，布雷迪擁有以下紀錄：

* **常規賽紀錄：**
    * 傳球碼數：89,214
    * 傳球達陣：649
    * 傳球完成率：64.3%
    * 傳球評分：97.2
    * 單場傳球碼數：505
    * 單場傳球達陣：7
* **季後賽紀錄：**
    * 傳球碼數：13,400
    * 傳球達陣：88
    * 傳球完成率：64.9%
    * 傳球評分：97.2
    * 單場傳球碼數：505
    * 單場傳球達陣：6
* **超級盃紀錄：**
    * 傳球碼數：3,039
    * 傳球達陣：21
    * 傳球完成率：66.7%
    * 傳球評分：97.2
    * 單場傳球碼數：505
    * 單場傳球達陣：5

曼寧擁有以下紀錄：

* **常規賽紀錄：**
    * 傳球碼數：71,940
    * 傳球達陣：539
    * 傳球完成率：65.3%
    * 傳球評分：96.5
    * 單場傳球碼數：499
    * 單場傳球達陣：7
* **季後賽紀錄：**
    * 傳球碼數：7,339
    * 傳球達陣：40
    * 傳球完成率：64.1%
    * 傳球評分：96.5
    * 單場傳球碼數：499
    * 單場傳球達陣：4
* **超級盃紀錄：**
    * 傳球碼數：1,149
    * 傳球達陣：9
    * 傳球完成率：62.9%
    * 傳球評分：93.4
    * 單場傳球碼數：499
    * 單場傳球達陣：4

總的來說，布雷迪在傳球碼數、傳球達陣、傳球完成率、傳球評分和單場傳球碼數等關鍵紀錄上都領先於曼寧。

The passing score is 97.2.

It's the 21st.

The passing score is 97.2.

The World Series is the championship series of Major League Baseball (MLB), and is played between the winners of the American League (AL) and National League (NL) Championship Series. The 2023 World Series is scheduled to begin on October 24, 2023, and will be played at a neutral site, to be determined.

ben.Qst: এই বছর বিশ্ব সিরিজে কে খেলবে?
ben.Rep:
2023 বিশ্ব সিরিজে খেলবে এমন দলগুলি এখনও নির্ধারিত হয়নি, কারণ 2023 মেজর লীগ বেসবল (MLB) মৌসুম এখনও চলছে। বিশ্ব সিরিজ সাধারণত অক্টোবরের শেষের দিকে বা নভেম্বরের শুরুতে অনুষ্ঠিত হয় এবং আমেরিকান লীগ (AL) এবং ন্যাশনাল লীগ (NL) চ্যাম্পিয়নদের মধ্যে একটি সেরা-সাত-গেম সিরিজ।

2023 বিশ্ব সিরিজে খেলবে এমন দলগুলি নির্ধারণ করা হবে AL এবং NL চ্যাম্পিয়নশিপ সিরিজের ফলাফলের উপর ভিত্তি করে, যা অক্টোবরের মাঝামাঝি অনুষ্ঠিত হবে।
ben.Rep_En:
The teams that will play in the 2023 World Series have yet to be determined, as the 2023 Major League Baseball (MLB) season is still underway.The World Series usually takes place in late October or early November and is a best-of-seven game series between the American League (AL) and National League (NL) champions.
The teams that play in the World Series will be determined based on the results of the 2023 AL and NL Championship Series, which will be held in mid-October.

fra.Qst: qui jouera dans la série mondiale cette année
fra.Rep: Les équipes qui joueront dans les World Series 2023 n'ont pas encore été déterminées. Les World Series sont le championnat de la Major League Baseball (MLB) et sont disputées entre les champions de la Ligue américaine (AL) et de la Ligue nationale (NL). Les séries éliminatoires de la MLB débutent en octobre et les World Series se jouent généralement fin octobre ou début novembre.
fra.Rep_En: The teams that will play in the 2023 World Series have not yet been determined. The World Series is the championship of Major League Baseball (MLB) and is contested between the champions of the American League (AL) and the National League (NL). The MLB playoffs begin in October and the World Series is usually played in late October or early November.

hin.Qst: जो इस साल विश्व श्रृंखला में खेलेंगे
hin.Rep:
2023 विश्व श्रृंखला में खेलने वाली टीमें अभी निर्धारित नहीं की गई हैं, क्योंकि 2023 मेजर लीग बेसबॉल सीज़न अभी भी चल रहा है। विश्व श्रृंखला अमेरिकन लीग और नेशनल लीग के चैंपियन के बीच खेली जाती है, जो लीग चैम्पियनशिप सीरीज़ में निर्धारित की जाती है।

2023 विश्व श्रृंखला अक्टूबर 2023 में होने वाली है।
hin.Rep_En:
The teams that will play in the 2023 World Series have not yet been determined, as the 2023 Major League Baseball season is still underway.The World Series is played between the champions of the American League and the National League, which is determined in the League Championship Series.
The 2023 World Series is scheduled to take place in October 2023.

nno.Qst: som vil spille i World Series i år
nno.Rep:
Det er for tidligt at sige med sikkerhed, hvilke hold der vil spille i World Series i år, da den regulære sæson stadig er i gang. Men baseret på de nuværende stillinger og holdenes præstationer er her nogle hold, der har gode chancer for at nå World Series:

**American League**

* New York Yankees
* Houston Astros
* Toronto Blue Jays
* Tampa Bay Rays
* Cleveland Guardians

**National League**

* Los Angeles Dodgers
* Atlanta Braves
* New York Mets
* San Diego Padres
* Milwaukee Brewers

Disse hold har alle stærke hold og har vist sig at være konsekvente i løbet af sæsonen. De har også erfarne spillere og trænere, der ved, hvad der skal til for at vinde.

Det er dog vigtigt at bemærke, at meget kan ændre sig i løbet af baseballsæsonen. Skader, handler og andre faktorer kan påvirke holdenes præstationer. Derfor er det umuligt at sige med sikkerhed, hvilke hold der vil spille i World Series, før sæsonen er slut.
nno.Rep_En:

These teams all have strong teams and have proven to be consistent over the course of the season. They also have experienced players and coaches, who know what it takes to win.
